acRemote_dialogues.sentence: Remote for the air conditioner, but it's broken.

penPen_dialogues.sentence:
Hey, we should move Pen-Pen in the center of the room!
 So it looks cooler, visually

No way. Why did you bring in this piece of trash anyway? 
It’s creepy.

Besides, didn't you say it would 
make a good mascot for our club yesterday?
WHAT? No! I never said that.

Air_Conditioner_dialogues.sentence: Why the heck don't they put a switch on the AC itself?
Yea, it’s not gonna work without the remote.

Pictures_Board_dialogues.sentence: Hey Haru! Are those pictures you took yesterday?
Oh yea, when we were hanging out in the yard!
I’ll print out more photos then!
